text: Alejandro Zamudio Galindo (born 25 February 1998) is a Mexican footballer who plays as a midfielder for Pumas Tabasco on loan from UNAM. ==Career== Zamudio was loaned out to Club Puebla for the 2019 season.Otra baja para el Clausura: Alejandro Zamudio deja Pumas para partir a préstamo al Puebla, dalepumas.bolavip.com, 30 December 2018 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Club Universidad Nacional footballers Category:Club Puebla players Category:Liga MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Tercera División de México players Category:Footballers from Mexico City
title: Alejandro Zamudio
